channel.title: https on Jiby's selfhosted effort
channel.description: Recent content in https on Jiby's selfhosted effort

item.title: Reverse-engineering webapp APIs with Firefox
item.description: I’m writing code to back up my user data off a website that lets me see all of my info (including querying by time, account etc) but doesn’t have export features (officially). I am certain there’s an API behind the site that I just have to make sense of. Since the webapp is requesting data from the API when I click, we should be able to record the web traffic to explore the API.
